name: Nameless (WolfWoot)
description:
A Top Down Shooter, where you play as a felon who is given a chance to be excused for his crimes. Use lethal and/or nonlethal weaponry to clear out a hotel full of terrorists. A game where there’s no “right” way to play (unless you’re ruthlessly murdering innocent people (...you know who you are...)).

Despite that, there are consequences, and the public and media will have...strong opinions about how you are approaching the problems you’re presented.

The game is influenced by Earthbound/Mother series, Deus Ex and Hotline miami.
